content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': "This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs per my latest action, I used the 'browse_website' command to gather information on Poki and found that it offers popular games such as Subway Surfers and Temple Run 2. Based on this information, I used the 'execute_python_file' command to open Subway Surfers in a new window. The latest development suggests that we can use the same command to open games listed on Poki, such as Subway Surfers or Temple Run 2. The plan is to use the 'execute_python_file' command to open one of the games listed on the website. Please note that the file 'open_game.py' should exist in the current working directory and should contain code to open Subway Surfers in a new window."}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command execute_python_file returned: Error: File '/home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/open_game.py' does not exist."}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "xdg-open https://www.poki.com/en/g/subway-surfers"}}}'}]
"""
